tweet: At the recent Cardano community meetup in Rotterdam, Edsko de Vries, Haskell consultant for IOHK, explained what UTxO is and how the Cardano wallet selects coins for transactions. Read a summary of his presentation on our forum:  https://t.co/RwGE2eZGmZ
